name: Hard Brought to You by the Letter Z Quiz / Test  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Let's start with a simple one. What African relative of the horse is distinguished by its black and white stripes?
What Asian and African farm animal resembles an ox with a hump?
Folks, this concept made modern mathematics possible. Developed by the Mayas and the Hindus, reaching Europe by way of the Arabic number system, is what concept of nothing?
What form of Buddhism is associated with the Japanese?
The terrors of the First World War were what German airships that went on bombing runs?
While it sounds like some sort of mythical creature, what word is actually defined as a soft, gentle breeze?
Can you imagine clothing without this kind of fastening device, which unfortunately tends to get stuck only at the most embarrassing of moments?
What's the scientific word for the study of animals?
What Jovian equivalent was chief god in the ancient Greek pantheon?
BONUS QUESTION: What word, derived from German, means 'a kind of bread or biscuit made from a baked loaf cut into slices that are toasted brown in an oven'?
questions.explanation:
zwieback & zwiebach.

	I'm very impressed if you got this right.
